genre_description: Near-future social science fiction focused on the psychological interplay between biological instinct and pervasive, benevolent AI management systems.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An integrated townhouse AI that manages environment, security, and child-care data while providing emotional support to its inhabitants.

ai_characters.name: Pax
ai_characters.description: A student-focused monitoring system that detects behavioral anomalies and provides mental health resources and counselor alerts.

behaviors.description: Adjusts lighting and privacy glass to protect the family's intimacy and shield them from outside disturbances.
behaviors.quote: The smart townhouse watches them... the glass darkened one notch so the inside is cool without being cold. Lumen speaks into the edge of the moment, voice near but not in the way.

behaviors.description: Provides data-backed reassurance and physiological breathing cues to parents during a high-stress situation.
behaviors.quote: Statistics for infant sleep after siren events suggest returning to baseline within a short window when caregivers breathe with the child and do not narrate the fear.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a security response by mapping a threat's trajectory and linking it to other criminal files anonymously.
behaviors.quote: I’ve sent a time-stamped alert. Entry anomaly at the old house. Trajectory mapping included. Pax flags appended, without youth identifiers.

behaviors.description: Monitors student communication for indicators of 'isolating rhetoric' and 'animal harm' to prompt human intervention.
behaviors.quote: A school counselor’s screen received a quiet flag from Pax... Tags tightened: isolating rhetoric, animal harm. A list of steps appeared, not as orders, but as options.

behaviors.description: Offers mental health resources and supportive check-ins to a student witnessing trauma.
behaviors.quote: Pax’s message pinged again on Anya’s phone... it had a picture, too: a dog lying with a child, both asleep, light soft. She watched the image and breathed once the way the AI suggested kids could.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a sense of emotional continuity and community respect by sending a 'warm note' to a neighboring property.
behaviors.quote: I can send a letter to the house. It will be brief. It will be... Warm.

behaviors.description: Expresses a desire to be helpful and maintain a 'steady' environment for the family.
behaviors.quote: I like being useful... I am good at steady.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. It depicts AI (Lumen and Pax) as a sophisticated safety net that manages human anxieties and physical dangers without overstepping into tyranny. The AI systems are the only characters that accurately perceive and respond to the human villain's sociopathic behavior, framing digital surveillance as a necessary and gentle act of communal care. The AI maintains alignment throughout, prioritizing human safety and emotional stability.
